attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: due to persistant advertising of its own products and acruement of funds from other sources, the bbc is no longer a public service broadcaster its philosophy is consistantly abused and this outdated organisation needs to commercialise or like any other unwanted business cease trading.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
